text: Bambi is the main character in the story of destiny Bambi and Felix Salten's book Bambi, A Life in the Woods. He is a European Roe Deer. Bambi is also the main character in the Disney movies based on both the story of destiny and novel: Bambi, Bambi II And Bambi: The Reckoning. In the movies, Bambi was an American white-tailed deer. ==References== Category:Bambi Category:Fictional characters introduced in the 1920s Category:Kingdom Hearts characters
title: Bambi (character)
